alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:56AM CST until March 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow, Travel Impacts Persist This Morning... .Snow continues early this morning over parts of southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa through central Wisconsin but is slowly diminishing from the west. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to possibly 2 inches are expected near and east of the Mississippi River before snow diminishes this morning. Many roads are snow-covered or slick, so exercise extra caution if you must travel early today. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Taylor and Clark Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
